title: What is this?! 1st time I'm forced to make this choice!
body:
http://imgur.com/Lt6iJdv

I was playing a normal bling pick with two others, and when i changed summoners at the last seconds I 'left' champ select, and got this message with a 30 second timer.

I chose for the left one, and I got back into champ select, only champ select had already stopped since I 'left'.

So it counted down until: "the battle is about to begin" and got stuck there, had to re-log.

replies.body: The client seems to be using old assets that are no longer used.  I recommend running the[ repair tool ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)which can be found on the top right of the client as a "?" icon as the first step.  If the issue persists after that, then you may be experiencing a network issue blocking a connection to our server, which our [Connection Troubleshoot ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide can help resolve.  Hope that helps!
